definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
to excuse sb/to exempt/to remove or dismiss from office/to avoid/to avert/to escape/to be prohibited
evening newspaper/(in a newspaper's name) Evening News
in the evening/when night falls/towards evening/at night fall/at dusk

sentences.english: An airbag that deploys a second later than it should is worse than no airbag at all.
sentences.chinese: 晚一秒鐘展開氣囊比沒有氣囊的情況更糟糕。

sentences.english: The Jiapigou gold deposit lies in the lower part of the late Archaean greenstone belt.
sentences.chinese: 夾皮溝金礦產於晚太古宙綠巖帶的下部層位。

sentences.english: It took place in late two thousand ten.
She rakes the ashes out of the stove in the evening every day.
sentences.chinese: 她每天晚上將爐渣從爐子裏耙出來。

sentences.english: At supper she had two huge plates full of lasagna.
sentences.chinese: 晚飯時她吃了兩大碗滿滿當當的肉醬寬麪條。

sentences.english: Let's pretend that you spend the evening out on the town.
sentences.chinese: 假設你在要在城裏度過一晚。

sentences.english: This was the result from the large-scale regression in the Late Ordovician.
sentences.chinese: 這是晚奧陶世晚期大規模海退的結果。

sentences.english: Xing Zhibin, and Luo Jing anchor the 7p. m. "Network News Broadcast"on China Central Television.
sentences.chinese: 央視邢質斌，羅京主持晚7點的《新聞聯播》。

sentences.english: The middle-aged man suddenly patted his head, Liu halal is hate see late.
sentences.chinese: 那中年人猛然拍拍腦袋，對劉清真是相恨見晚。

sentences.english: And we get to go home early, you know, six o'clock, seven o'clock, latest, you know.
sentences.chinese: 我們還可以早回家，六點，最晚七點。

sentences.english: At present, the age of storm deposits reported in China may be traced back to late proterozoic.
sentences.chinese: 目前我國已報導的風暴沉積時代可追溯到晚元古代。

sentences.english: The fish has also shown up late in the puffin's breeding season.
sentences.chinese: 在海雀繁殖季節，這種魚出現比較晚。

sentences.english: I am exhausted. I shouldn't have stayed up playing PC games last night.
sentences.chinese: 我累了，昨晚我不該打遊戲到很晚的。

sentences.english: TimeSecurity guards organize activities from 8:00 in the morning until 8:00 in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 從早8點到晚8點，獄警們舉辦各種活動。

sentences.english: U13: We stayed up very late to watch a film last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨天晚上我們看電影看到很晚。

sentences.english: Let your work be, bride, the guest has come in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 放下畝裟工作吧，新娘，客人在晚上來了。

definition: very early in the morning/in the wee hours
in the evening/when night falls/towards evening/at night fall/at dusk
